mapper.select: SELECT cc_id, construction_period, project_name, design_contract.dc_id, design_contract.contract_number FROM construction_contract JOIN design_contract ON construction_contract.cc_dc_id = design_contract.dc_id ORDER BY contract_number, construction_period;

SELECT * FROM construction_contract JOIN employee ON construction_contract.cc_latest_editor = employee.code JOIN design_contract ON construction_contract.cc_dc_id = design_contract.dc_id JOIN estimate_type ON construction_contract.cc_et_id = estimate_type.et_id WHERE cc_id = #{ccId};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO construction_contract (cc_dc_id, cc_et_id, estimate_year, estimate_month, construction_period, project_name, site_address, site_area, separete_construction, planned_price, contract_price, contractor_name, remarks_section, blueprint_address, cc_created_at, cc_updated_at, cc_latest_editor) VALUES (#{ccDcId}, #{ccEtId}, #{estimateYear}, #{estimateMonth}, #{constructionPeriod}, #{projectName}, #{siteAddress}, #{siteArea}, #{separeteConstruction}, #{plannedPrice}, #{contractPrice}, #{contractorName}, #{remarksSection}, #{blueprintAddress}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{ccLatestEditor});
mapper.update: UPDATE construction_contract SET cc_dc_id = #{ccDcId}, cc_et_id = #{ccEtId}, estimate_year = #{estimateYear}, estimate_month = #{estimateMonth}, construction_period = #{constructionPeriod}, project_name = #{projectName}, site_address = #{siteAddress}, site_area = #{siteArea}, separete_construction = #{separeteConstruction}, planned_price = #{plannedPrice}, contract_price = #{contractPrice}, contractor_name = #{contractorName}, remarks_section = #{remarksSection}, blueprint_address = #{blueprintAddress}, cc_updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, cc_latest_editor = #{ccLatestEditor} WHERE cc_id = #{ccId};
